title: Family, Western Movie | The Terror of Tiny Town (1938) Billy Curtis, Yvonne Moray

sources.title: Family, Western Movie | The Terror of Tiny Town (1938) Billy Curtis, Yvonne Moray
sources.description:
An evil gunslinging midget comes to terrorize the good little people of Tiny Town. The townspeople organize to defeat him, and zany antics ensue

Multilingual subtitles available

Director: Sam Newfield
Writer: Fred Myton, Clarence Marks 
Stars: Billy Curtis, Yvonne Moray, 'Little Billy' Rhodes 
Genre:Â Action & Adventure, Comedy, Musical & Performing Arts, Western
Budget: $100,000 USD
